PHRASE.LANG: kName
Broken Barley Tea Set
Service à thé d'orge en morceaux
Zerbrochener Gerstentee-Set
Servizio da orzata in frantumi
Juego de té de trigo agrietado
割れた麦湯セット
깨진 숭늉 그릇 세트
Broken Barley Tea Set
破碎的麥茶組
破碎的麥茶組
Broken Barley Tea Set
kDesc
Teapot and tea cups thought to be broken in the havoc of the spirits. Seems that you can hear the grudge of the broken items. [#Legal]
Théière et tasse qui auraient été brisées par un monstre. On peut ressentir la colère de tous ces petits morceaux.[#Legal]
Teekanne und -tasse, welche vermutlich von Monstern zerbrochen wurden. Es ist, als könnte man den Groll der kaputten Stücke wahrnehmen.[#Legal]
Pare che il contenitore e il bicchiere siano stati rotti dai mostri. L'ira del set frantumato è quasi palpabile. [#Legal]
Tetera y tazas de té que fueron rotas por los monstruos. Puedes sentir la cólera de estos utensilios.[#Legal]
モノノケに荒らされて割れてしまったと思われる急須や湯呑。道具たちの恨みが聞こえてくるようだ。[#Legal]
요괴가 날뛰는 바람에 깨졌다고 여겨지는 차주전자와 찻잔. 도구들의 원한이 느껴지는 듯 하다. [#Legal]
Teapot and tea cups thought to be broken in the havoc of the spirits. Seems that you can hear the grudge of the broken items. [#Legal]
應該是因為妖怪搗亂而碎掉的茶壺和茶杯。彷彿聽到茶具的怨恨。[#Legal]
應該是因為妖怪搗亂而碎掉的茶壺和茶杯。彷彿聽到茶具的怨恨。[#Legal]
Teapot and tea cups thought to be broken in the havoc of the spirits. Seems that you can hear the grudge of the broken items. [#Legal]
